Text: FW Office Visit Cc Hi Susan I sent the note below today to your other email account Friday January is a good day for you to visit us When I sent the note below I had forgotten that Jaquelyn Lewis was on vacation this week Please send me a reply if you would like our assistance arranging travel and I will ask my administrative assistant Carol Nelson to help you Alternatively if you book your own airfare and hotel we will reimburse you We look forward to seeing you Julie Ryan From Ryan Julia M Sent Wednesday January AM To Susan Scott Cc Lewis Jacquelyn Subject RE Office Visit Susan Friday January works well for us I have asked Jaquelyn Lewis to contact you to help arrange travel for you Jaquelyns telephone numer is if you need to reach her We look forward to seeing you soon Please feel free to call me with any questions you have Regards Julie Ryan From Susan ScottSMTP Sent Sunday December PM To Subject Re Office Visit Julie I wanted to thank you again for taking the time to speak with me last Friday I appreciated hearing what you had to say regarding the position and look forward to discussing it further with yourself and the rest of the group Also the additional information you emailed was very helpful in getting a better grasp of the role you are looking to fill with Puget I have had a chance to look at my schedule for the week of January th and believe that meeting that Friday the th would work best for myself You may reach me via email or by phone at M to let me know if the timing works for you as well Once again I am eager to hear more about the company the portfolio and the direction you are hoping to take the group The position sounds like an exciting opportunity and one with definite interest to myself Thank you Susan Scott Send and receive Hotmail on your mobile device
